ProductInfo.Features: You'll spin for this music and camera phone. Entertain yourself with a 1.3 megapixel camera, high-speed video, streaming TV, and stereo support. Keep rockin' with an MP3 music player and identify songs with music ID. It's the ultimate multimedia device underneath a sleek ultra thin design. Get simultaneous multitasking with your Bluetooth® wireless accessories and take talk and tunes to go. Send messages using instant messaging, email, or Picture and Video messaging. Stay entertained with MobiTV and XM Radio Mobile and take advantage of streaming TV & digital radio capabilities. The Trax can even can sync music including Napster(TM) and Yahoo!® Music from your pc to your phone. For music, high-speed video and more, the Trax has everything you need to walk to the beat of your own tune.
ProductInfo.Name: Lg Trax Cu575 GSM Unlocked Cell Phone
